comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: translation: "Radio Free Europe (Radio Television). North American radio installed in the municipality of Salvaterra de Magos, to relay programs to the Eastern bloc as part of the strategy to fight communism." Photograph by Mário Novais.

comment.realname: Biblioteca de Arte / Art Library Fundação Calouste Gulbenkian

comment._content:
